description:
Facebook would have been 3rd largest country, based on the subscribers it has. Its huge potential is huge, but since its based on principal of community, if you advertise wrongly very fast your would be sent to oblivion. It is very important to understand how to market on Facebook or social media ads, so that you can reach the correct demographics, correct market, ads are relevant and effective ROI is achieved.

Facebook ads are cheaper than most other platforms and ROI is higher, for that very important reason doing it properly becomes absolutely essential. 

In this course you would learn in slides and live demo of :

1> Different Components involved in FB ads
2> How to create step by step
3> Criteria or metrics for good campaign

Remember to take your learning and create compelling Facebook ads.

I have been doing this for over a decade and ran campaigns for many companies including Unilever, Nestle, IBM, Guinness, SingTel, Mothercare and more.
title: Step by Step Facebook Ads Beginners Guide
